data.title: Rock N Rolla question
data.meta_description: So the Russians killed Thandie Newton right? I don't remember them showing either the Russians or her again after that scene.
data.text:
Feb 2, 2009 Add bookmark #1 So the Russians killed Thandie Newton right? I don't remember them showing either the Russians or her again after that scene. Feb 2, 2009 Add bookmark #2 ROT-13d to avoid spoylage READ NO FURTHER IF YOU HAVEN'T SEEN IT!



.



Lrf. Gur vzcyvpngvba orvat gung gur Ehffvna xvyyrq ure sbe univat gur cnvagvat, gura Nepuvr tvivat vg gb Wbuaal (ur zragvbaf vf pbfgvat gur Ehffvna naq nez naq n yrt, fb cerfhznoyl Nepuvr xvyyrq uvz naq gbbx vg) Feb 2, 2009 Add bookmark #3 I think it's left purposely ambiguous. I don't see him having her killed just for the painting, he could just take it.

After all he wanted her to marry him. Feb 2, 2009 Add bookmark #4
quote:
Originally posted by Frennzy:
Yes.

The implication being that the Russian killed her for having the painting, then Archie giving it to Johnny (he mentions is costing the Russian and arm and a leg, so presumably Archie killed him and took it)


Yeah I got that part about the arm and the leg. Thandie Newton is too hot to die though.

Good movie all around. The handsome bob scene was hilarious, then the dancing scene, and then later, at the restaurant..

"You didn't tell me there would be guns with war criminals attached to the triggers."

Best line of the movie. Feb 2, 2009 Add bookmark #5 dhbgr:
Bevtvanyyl cbfgrq ol Fnvag:
V guvax vg'f yrsg checbfryl nzovthbhf. V qba'g frr uvz univat ure xvyyrq whfg sbe gur cnvagvat, ur pbhyq whfg gnxr vg.

Nsgre nyy ur jnagrq ure gb zneel uvz.



Lrnu, ohg gura ur fnj gur cnvagvat, naq nfxrq uvf urnil gb pbzr vafvqr...gur urnil fnvq "unaq zr zl tybirf"

V qba'g guvax gung'f gbb nzovthbhf... Feb 2, 2009 Add bookmark #6 I have a suggestion. Why not change the title of this thread to say:

Rock N Rolla question WITH A HUGE FUCKING SPOILER IN THE FIRST SENTENCE OF THE OP. FUCK YOU IF YOU HAVEN'T SEEN THE FILM! Feb 2, 2009 Add bookmark #8
quote:
Originally posted by wb:
I have a suggestion. Why not change the title of this thread to say:

Rock N Rolla question WITH A HUGE FUCKING SPOILER IN THE FIRST SENTENCE OF THE OP. FUCK YOU IF YOU HAVEN'T SEEN THE FILM!

Or at least "for those who have seen it".

I didn't even know it was a film, so any idiot rambling about "don't open the thread" can preemptively shut the fuck up. I thought it might be a music thread or something.

Seriously, shut the fuck up, don't even start. Feb 2, 2009 Add bookmark #9 oddly, I thought there WAS a spoylar tag in the title, or I would have ROT-13d...don't know how that happened.

apologies to anyone who got spoyaled.
